title: Digital Creativity-Based Professional Learning Community (PLC) Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool utilization skills and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: Training program for teachers and educators aiming to design differentiated language learning in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain language education design processes by utilizing the four core menus (team formation, training, workspace, announcements) of a digital creativity-based PLC.
Learners can create educational design plans by analyzing individualized learner needs within a PLC platform using digital tools (surveys/document analysis).
Learners can develop formative assessment plans applying interaction models in online collaborative environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
